Create the home you love, and you could WIN R1 Million
The most anticipated South African competition is back! You could be the 2022 homechoice millionaire if you shop before 28 November 2022.
Create the home you love by shopping our wide range of top-quality bedding sets, chef-approved cookware, trendy homeware and the latest décor for your chance to earn entries into this life-changing competition.
Every order is an entry into the competition, whether you are shopping online, placing an order with a friendly sales agent or getting a head start on your Christmas shopping at your nearest homechoice showroom.
Every order earns you an entry!
Every purchase, big or small, made before the end of November 2022 will earn you an entry into the WIN a million competition PLUS qualifying customers can buy mattresses and base sets and only pay in February 2023! Find out more about buy now, pay later here!
The more you shop, the better your chances of winning! Click here to read the official rules to WIN R1 Million to create the home you love.

Earn entries on your homechoice account homechoice offers you a range of payment options to suit your lifestyle. Use your homechoice account to create the home you love while earning entries into the WIN a million competition. You can shop with confidence and enjoy prices and credit that you can afford. Increase your credit limit with longer terms by paying your account regularly.
